Conflict.comment: use only one of these plugins.
use only one of these plugins:		'f&f_scarce.esp'- less friends and foes.		'f&f_moar.esp' - moar friends and foes.
choose only one plugin:		'wares-moar.esp' - traders have double the amount of "wares" items.		'wares-even-moar.esp' - traders have triple the amount of "wares" items.
"friends and foes" includes and expands on "cm_partners", "outlaws", "starfire's npcs" and "mca". f&f_base.esm is an older version of friends and foes
"friends and frens" includes and expands on companions from "cm_partners""mca".
use only one of these plugins:		'wares_tr_npcs.esp'- npc use wares lists including wares-aware mods.		'wares_tr_npcs_purist.esp' - npc use wares lists but only td/oaab, respecting value and style.
use only one of these plugins:		'wares_vv_npcs.esp'- npc use wares lists including wares-aware mods.		'wares_vv_npcs_purist.esp' - npc use wares lists but only td/oaab, respecting value and style.
use only one of these plugins:		'wares_pc_npcs.esp'- npc use wares lists including wares-aware mods.		'wares_pc_npcs_purist.esp' - npc use wares lists but only td/oaab, respecting value and style.

use only one of these plugins:		'oaab for wares.esp'- old, use wares_lists_oaab.esp.		'wares_lists_oaab.esp' - latest version.
use only one of these plugins:		'f&f_companions.esp'- old and unsupported, use friends and frens.esp.		'friends & frens - base.esm' - latest version.
use only one of these plugins:		'hold_it*.esp'- old and unsupported, use wares_lists_hold.esp.		'wares_lists_hold.esp' - latest version.
